paramInformation.label: Start-Up Status
paramInformation.description: Defines the status of the device, in term of light level, following a restart. Allowable range: 0-99, 255

paramInformation.label: Fade On Time
paramInformation.description: Defines the time spent to switch the load from complete OFF to complete ON

paramInformation.label: Fade Off Time
paramInformation.description: Defines the time spent to switch the load from complete ON to complete OFF

paramInformation.label: Local Dimming Time
paramInformation.description: Defines the time spent to switch the controlled load

paramInformation.label: Minimum Light Level
paramInformation.description: Defines which light level will correspond to 1% in the range between 1 and 98%

paramInformation.label: Maximum Light Level
paramInformation.description: Defines which light level will correspond to 99% in the range between 2 and 99%

paramInformation.label: Dimmable Load
paramInformation.description: Define if the connected loads are dimmable or not

paramInformation.label: Type of External Switch
paramInformation.description: Defines the type of external switch connected to the device
